field.controlledMessage: Please enter at least three letters.

htmlText.featureText:
This is a prototype multiparticipant experiment.

With this prototype you can:
  • view the group activity and add dummy users to a group for testing purposes /multiparticipant/grouptestpage.html.
  • erase the local data for this browser /multiparticipant?debug
  • random data can be generated with the testing robot /multiparticipant/TestingFrame.html

  • eight users intracting can be randomly simulated testing robot /multiparticipant/grouptestframes.html

    • The group name must be allocated with the following with /multiparticipant/?group=a_group_name where a_group_name should be replaced with a suitable string. A second user can be tested on one computer via the incognito browser window with this link, providing the group name matches.

    There needs to be eight users connected for the group process to begin. Once a group is full, any subsequent users will need to be allocated a different group via the a_group_name parameter.


    You can view the collected group data with /multiparticipant-admin/groupdataviewer with the user and password you have been supplied.

saveMetadataButton.networkErrorMessage: Could not contact the server, please check your internet connection and try again.

htmlText.featureText: A choice must be provided out of the following:
Add information before the beginning of each round, telling the participants who theyâ€™re about to play with
The producer sees the stimulus and enters some text

stimulusFreeText.featureText: Vul een woord in de tekstbox in dat volgens u het best aan het einde van de zin past.

htmlText.featureText: All other participants wait for the producer
The stimulus and the producers text are shown to all participants
there should be a summary informing participants at the end of each round about how many points they made as a dyad and as a group for that round (and so far).
Add information before the beginning of each round, telling the participants who theyâ€™re about to play with
The producer sees the stimulus and enters some text

stimulusFreeText.featureText: Vul een woord in de tekstbox in dat volgens u het best aan het einde van de zin past.

htmlText.featureText: The guesser waits for the producer
The producer waits for the guesser
The guesser sees the text with a grid of stimuli, from which they select one based on the text
The guesser and producer see the allocated stimuli with the guessers selected stimuli and the text from the producer. Following this the next stimulus is selected and the flow returns to activity 0.
✔
✘

sendGroupMessageButton.eventTag: guesser and producer see the response

plainText.featureText: Geen verbinding met de server. Controleer alstublieft uw internetverbinding en probeer het opnieuw.
